title: Top Government Effectiveness
description: In 2023, Switzerland achieved a perfect score of 100 in government effectiveness, ranking at the upper bound of the 90% confidence interval globally.

title: Leading Chemical Manufacturing Sector
description: In 2021, chemicals accounted for 29.15% of the value added in Switzerland's manufacturing sector, highlighting its significant role in the economy.

title: High Out-of-Pocket Health Expenditure
description: In 2022, Swiss citizens spent $2,366 per capita on out-of-pocket health expenses, indicating a high personal financial burden in healthcare.

title: Substantial Private Health Expenditure
description: Switzerland's domestic private health expenditure per capita was $7,131 in 2022, reflecting a strong reliance on private health funding.

title: Negative Reserves and Related Items
description: In 2023, Switzerland reported a negative balance of $132 billion in reserves and related items, indicating financial challenges in this area.
